title: Bolero Flats
posting_body: ['Welcome Home to Bolero Flats', 'Live, work and play in luxury at Bolero Flats Apartments in downtown Minneapolis!', 'Whether you’re looking for a stylish place to unwind, an inspiring work environment or a lively neighborhood full of shopping, dining and schools, Bolero Flats has it all.', 'Our high speed internet, exceptional cell service, fully outfitted business center and breathtaking views makes Bolero Flats a haven for remote workers while our exceptionally upgraded apartments make coming home something to look forward to.', 'Our spacious one and two bedroom apartment homes include fully equipped kitchens with high end appliances, granite countertops, luxurious plank flooring, modern fixtures and finishes, unique apartment layouts, and ample closet space.', 'Our residents enjoy an indoor swimming pool and spa, parking ramp, direct skyway access, basketball court, outdoor tennis court, easy access to freeways, and more.', 'Bolero Flats is your destination for downtown Minneapolis Luxury Apartments.', 'Come by and tour our spacious one and two bedroom apartment homes today!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 4', 'OR Text', '4', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact us.', 'Interested in more information?', 'Visit link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1043 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Dishwasher', '- Views', '- Granite Countertops', '- Plank Flooring', '- Extra Storage', '- Black GE Appliance Package', '- Central Heat and Air', 'Community Amenities', '- Parking Garage', '- Tennis Court', '- 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Bolero Flats', '1117 Marquette Ave., Minneapolis, MN, 55403', 'z5PekXK4Y']
